A looking-glass for persecutors containing multitudes of examples of God's severe, but righteous judgments, upon bloody and merciless haters of His children in all times, from the beginning of the world to this present age : collected out of the sacred Scriptures, and other ecclesiastical writers, both ancient and modern / by Sam. Clarke ... Clarke, Samuel, 1599-1682.
[10], 116, [14] p., 1 leaf of plates : port.
Printed for William Miller ..., London : 1674.
Advertisement: p. [8]-[14] at end. Errata: p. [7] at end. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
